content.question: Which of the following best explains the concept of the iron triangle, as illustrated in the diagram?

choices.label: To show how interest groups work to increase the size of their membership
To show how bureaucratic agencies and Congress gather public feedback on proposed regulations
To show how interest groups, Congress, and the bureaucracy interact in a public policy area
To show the process that both houses of Congress use to pass new public policies

content.answer: To show how interest groups, Congress, and the bureaucracy interact in a public policy area
